lb:
During an [Airstrike], all Squadrons will launch 10 more planes.
Refined Taste upgraded to Level 2.

Bombers will drop their payloads before being engaged by enemy Anti-Air fire.
Iron Maiden upgraded to Level 2.

During Day Battle, increases all damage by 30%.
Refined Taste upgraded to Level 3.

Increases aircraft reserves for all categories by 50 aircraft each.
Iron Maiden upgraded to Level 3.

During Day Battle, gains the ability to launch an [Airstrike] immediately that deals 50% damage. This attack will not incur any plane loss.
Refined Taste upgraded to Level 4.

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Airstrikes: Can launch attacks from the map and in battle, has infinite range, reload time when used on map: 60s in battle: 25
Reconnaissance: Planes can be sent when on the map to reveal the fog of war, reload time: 10s

skills.name:
Reserve Air Wing
予備艦攻隊
text: Upon entering a map, increases Torpedo Bomber reserves by 150.

skills.name:
Swordfish Attack
ソードフィッシュアタック
text:
1 .When [Torpedo Bomber] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
2. After [Flooding] ends, target will take 140% of Illustrious' Firepower in damage.

skills.name:
Nightmare of Taranto
タラントの悪夢
text: In Map Mode, first [Pre-emptive Airstrike] deals 200% more damage. 100 seconds after entering a map, buff will be lost.

comment: A confident royal knight. Although normally logical, the solutions she thinks up are usually very vague, garnering her the name "Princess Brawn for Brains" by those around her.
